description: Targus TSM08001US Velos Messenger is designed to provide two distinct looks with one case. The messenger includes two interchangeable shoulder straps ¿ each in a different color to match whatever mood you are in. Straps are easy to change, just unlock the closures on each side of the bag to release the strap, insert a different colored strap and then lock the closures back into place. The interior features a separate, dual cushioned laptop section designed to protect laptops with up to 15.4" screens. The Velos messenger features interior rain flaps to help protect against water leakage in wet weather. The cushioned carry handle is also retractable and lies flat when not in use. Featuring a smart and stylish design, the Velos messenger is a unisex case that includes plenty of storage space for school supplies or mobile accessories, charcoal
title: Targus TSM08001US Velos Messenger Bag (Charcoal)
